claims.text: The government has detained and removed over 35,000 people with no right to be here.

claimReview.title: Have 35,000 people been 'detained and removed' from the UK ...
claimReview.textualRating: This is misleading. While there were around 35,000 immigration returns during Labour’s first year in government, most were not detained or forcibly removed. Government data shows that only around a quarter of these departures were “enforced” returns.

claims.text: Keir Starmer has announced that from 1 November the government will reduce internet speeds from midnight until 6am.

claimReview.title: The government isn't going to slow the internet at night from ...
claimReview.textualRating: False. No such policy has been announced. Social media videos claiming this feature fake audio, which was almost certainly AI-generated, over old footage of Mr Starmer.
